verses.verse: Let <WG3049> a man <WG444> so <WG3779> account <WG3049> <WG5737> of us <WG2248>, as <WG5613> of the ministers <WG5257> of Moshiach <WG5547>, and <WG2532> stewards <WG3623> of the mysteries <WG3466> of 'Elohim <WG2316>.

For <WG1063> I know <WG4894> <WG5758> nothing <WG3762> by myself <WG1683>; yet <WG235> am I <WG1344> not <WG3756> hereby <WG1722> <WG5129> justified <WG1344> <WG5769>: but <WG1161> he that judgeth <WG350> <WG5723> me <WG3165> is <WG2076> <WG5748> the YY <WG2962>.

For <WG1063> who <WG5101> maketh <WG1252> thee <WG4571> to differ <WG1252> <WG5719> from another? and <WG1161> what <WG5101> hast thou <WG2192> <WG5719> that <WG3739> thou didst <WG2983> not <WG3756> receive <WG2983> <WG5627>? <WG1161> now if <WG1499> thou didst receive <WG2983> <WG5627> it, why <WG5101> dost thou glory <WG2744> <WG5736>, as <WG5613> if thou hadst <WG2983> not <WG3361> received <WG2983> <WG5631> it ?

Now <WG2235> ye are <WG2075> <WG5748> full <WG2880> <WG5772>, now <WG2235> ye are rich <WG4147> <WG5656>, ye have reigned as kings <WG936> <WG5656> without <WG5565> us <WG2257>: and <WG2532> I would to 'Elohim <WG3785> <WG1065> ye did reign <WG936> <WG5656>, that <WG2443> we <WG2249> also <WG2532> might reign with <WG4821> <WG5661> you <WG5213>.

For <WG1063> I think <WG1380> <WG5719> that <WG3754> 'Elohim <WG2316> hath set forth <WG584> <WG5656> us <WG2248> the emissarys <WG652> last <WG2078>, as <WG5613> it were appointed to death <WG1935>: for <WG3754> we are made <WG1096> <WG5675> a spectacle <WG2302> unto the world <WG2889>, and <WG2532> to angels <WG32>, and <WG2532> to men <WG444>.

We <WG2249> are fools <WG3474> for <WG1223> Moshiach's <WG5547> sake <WG1223>, but <WG1161> ye <WG5210> are wise <WG5429> in <WG1722> Moshiach <WG5547>; we <WG2249> are weak <WG772>, but <WG1161> ye <WG5210> are strong <WG2478>; ye <WG5210> are honourable <WG1741>, but <WG1161> we <WG2249> are despised <WG820>.

And <WG2532> labour <WG2872> <WG5719>, working <WG2038> <WG5740> with our own <WG2398> hands <WG5495>: being reviled <WG3058> <WG5746>, we bless <WG2127> <WG5719>; being persecuted <WG1377> <WG5746>, we suffer it <WG430> <WG5736>:

Being defamed <WG987> <WG5746>, we intreat <WG3870> <WG5719>: we are made <WG1096> <WG5675> as <WG5613> the filth <WG4027> of the world <WG2889>, and are the offscouring <WG4067> of all things <WG3956> unto <WG2193> this day <WG737>.
I write <WG1125> <WG5719> not <WG3756> these things <WG5023> to shame <WG1788> <WG5723> you <WG5209>, but <WG235> as <WG5613> my <WG3450> beloved <WG27> sons <WG5043> I warn <WG3560> <WG5719> you.

For <WG1063> though <WG1437> ye have <WG2192> <WG5725> ten thousand <WG3463> instructors <WG3807> in <WG1722> Moshiach <WG5547>, yet <WG235> have ye not <WG3756> many <WG4183> fathers <WG3962>: for <WG1063> in <WG1722> Moshiach <WG5547> Yeshuw`a <WG2424> I <WG1473> have begotten <WG1080> <WG5656> you <WG5209> through <WG1223> the gospel <WG2098>.

For <WG1223> this <WG5124> cause <WG1223> have I sent <WG3992> <WG5656> unto you <WG5213> Timotheus <WG5095>, who <WG3739> is <WG2076> <WG5748> my <WG3450> beloved <WG27> son <WG5043>, and <WG2532> faithful <WG4103> in <WG1722> the YY <WG2962>, who <WG3739> shall bring <WG363> you <WG5209> into remembrance <WG363> <WG5692> of my <WG3450> ways <WG3598> which <WG3588> be in <WG1722> Moshiach <WG5547>, as <WG2531> I teach <WG1321> <WG5719> every where <WG3837> in <WG1722> every <WG3956> Congregation <WG1577>.
Now <WG1161> some <WG5100> are puffed up <WG5448> <WG5681>, as though <WG5613> I <WG3450> would <WG2064> not <WG3361> come <WG2064> <WG5740> to <WG4314> you <WG5209>.
